subtitle: Who are we ?
aboutParagraph: developing your business through the web is tricky and confusing. that's why we exist . we are a team of graduated web experts, marketers and designers. our passion is to expand and bring ideas to life. once you hire us. feel free to throw your ideas on us. that's our sole purpose. we believe every business has the right to expand their legacy through the net . we are ready to design , plan , develop , code , deploy your desired application for an affordable price . consider us web angels . and let us source up your business to the cloud
tousalikDescription: tousalik is a commercial cms website for selling bags, backpacks and sports clothing
yankeesDescription: yankees is an ecommerce food delivery web application . it has ton of features such as a cart system and an online payment system. and an admin panel which manages the menus and the toppings and the business schedule and the delivery zone
connectoDescription: connecto is a social media web application where users can sign up and follow other users and see their posts . like and comment . it was developed personally for our team for entertainment reasons
